column4: i guess ediban has left...anyone else here can help me secure my pc a bit?
you should pastebin exact messages, not paraphrase them
just prefix what you say with "jrib: " if you want to get my attention
you just ask your question and include the link to the pastebin that has the relevant details
where do you see that?  The changelog for a package?
pastebin the output of: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install libasl2-2
run, the command the error says to run
just type 'jr' and then press tab to get my name to complete automatically
hmm, check bugs.ubuntu.com for bugs on that package
sure, you can search for the package and then view open bugs
